ticket.title: i18n reload does not read new localization files in matching directories
ticket.original-body:
Adding new file in a directory matching the config.i18n.load_path configuration and reloading the application from console (or by executing new request in development mode) does not read the translations that are included in the new file.
Renaming one of existing localization file leads to "Errno::ENOENT: No such file or directory" exception after reloading.
This happens on rails 3.0.3
